tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE clinical_trial_stem_cell_therapy (
  trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  medical_condition VARCHAR(255),
  treatment VARCHAR(255),
  treatment_success BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE stem_cell_trials (
    trial_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    condition VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    treatment VARCHAR(255),
    trial_start_date DATE,
    trial_end_date DATE,
    outcome TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE stem_cell_trials (
    trial_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID NOT NULL,
    therapy_type VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    condition_treated VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    trial_start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    trial_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patient_data (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    age INT NOT NULL,
    gender VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    medical_history TEXT,
    contact_information JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE trial_results (
    result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    trial_id UUID NOT NULL,
    patient_id UUID NOT NULL,
    outcome VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    result_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Trials (
    trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trial_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    condition_id INT REFERENCES Conditions(condition_id)
);

CREATE TABLE trial_patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    condition VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    enrollment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE treatment_details (
    treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    treatment_date DATE,
    dosage VARCHAR(50),
    remarks TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE trial_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    result_date DATE,
    improvement VARCHAR(50),
    side_effects TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE medical_conditions (
    condition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    condition_name VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE researchers (
    researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(50),
    specialty VARCHAR(100),
    institution VARCHAR(100)
)
